entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Thursday 30 March 2023
